gallery.label: Animals and nature
gallery.supertip: Inserts preset animal and nature emojis

gallery.label: Food and drink
gallery.supertip: Inserts preset food and drink emojis

gallery.label: Activity and sports
gallery.supertip: Inserts preset activity and sports emojis

gallery.label: Travel and places
gallery.supertip: Inserts preset travel and place emojis

gallery.label: Objects
gallery.supertip: Inserts preset object emojis

gallery.label: Symbols
gallery.supertip: Inserts preset symbol emojis

menu.label: Harvey Balls
menu.supertip: Opens a gallery of preset and custom Harvey Balls for visually expressing progress, status, or completeness. Includes quick‑insert percentages, a custom option, and tools for averaging selected Harvey Balls.

button.supertip: Inserts a Harvey Ball showing 10% completion
Inserts a Harvey Ball showing 20% completion
Inserts a Harvey Ball showing 25% completion
Inserts a Harvey Ball showing 30% completion
Inserts a Harvey Ball showing 33% completion
Inserts a Harvey Ball showing 40% completion
Inserts a Harvey Ball showing 50% completion
Inserts a Harvey Ball showing 60% completion
Inserts a Harvey Ball showing 67% completion
Inserts a Harvey Ball showing 70% completion
Inserts a Harvey Ball showing 75% completion
Inserts a Harvey Ball showing 80% completion
Inserts a Harvey Ball showing 90% completion
Inserts a Harvey Ball showing 100% completion

button.label: Custom...
button.supertip: Inserts a Harvey Ball with a custom completion value

button.label: Average based on selected Harvey Balls
button.supertip: Calculates and inserts a Harvey Ball representing the average of the selected Harvey Balls

menu.label: Star rating
menu.supertip: Inserts preset star ratings on a five‑point scale

button.label: 0.5 star
button.supertip: Inserts or updates a 0.5‑star rating indicator

button.label: 1 star
button.supertip: Inserts or updates a 1‑star rating indicator

button.label: 1.5 star
button.supertip: Inserts or updates a 1.5-star rating indicator

button.label: 2 star
button.supertip: Inserts or updates a 2‑star rating indicator

button.label: 2.5 star
button.supertip: Inserts or updates a 2.5‑star rating indicator

button.label: 3 star
button.supertip: Inserts or updates a 3‑star rating indicator

button.label: 3.5 star
button.supertip: Inserts or updates a 3.5‑star rating indicator

button.label: 4 star
button.supertip: Inserts or updates a 4‑star rating indicator

button.label: 4.5 star
button.supertip: Inserts or updates a 4.5‑star rating indicator

button.label: 5 star
button.supertip: Inserts or updates a 5‑star rating indicator

button.label: Average based on selected star ratings
button.supertip: Inserts a star rating indicator based on the average of the selected shapes

menu.label: RAG status
menu.supertip: Provides quick access to Red, Amber, and Green RAG status indicators, including an option to insert an averaged status based on selected shapes

button.label: Red
button.supertip: Inserts or updates a Red RAG status indicator

button.label: Amber
button.supertip: Inserts or updates an Amber RAG status indicator

button.label: Green
button.supertip: Inserts or updates a Green RAG status indicator

button.label: Average based on selected RAG status-shapes
button.supertip: Inserts a RAG status indicator based on the average of the selected shapes

menu.label: Legend
menu.supertip: Provides quick access to square and circle legends in vertical or horizontal layouts, including custom options

button.label: 3 squares vertical
button.supertip: Inserts a vertical legend with 3 squares

button.label: 5 squares vertical
button.supertip: Inserts a vertical legend with 5 squares

button.label: 10 squares vertical
button.supertip: Inserts a vertical legend with 10 squares

button.label: 3 circles vertical
button.supertip: Inserts a vertical legend with 3 circles

button.label: 5 circles vertical
button.supertip: Inserts a vertical legend with 5 circles

button.label: 10 circles vertical
button.supertip: Inserts a vertical legend with 10 circles

button.label: 3 squares horizontal
button.supertip: Inserts a horizontal legend with 3 squares

button.label: 5 squares horizontal
button.supertip: Inserts a horizontal legend with 5 squares

button.label: 10 squares horizontal
button.supertip: Inserts a horizontal legend with 10 squares

button.label: 3 circles horizontal
button.supertip: Inserts a horizontal legend with 3 circles

button.label: 5 circles horizontal
button.supertip: Inserts a horizontal legend with 5 circles

button.label: 10 circles horizontal
button.supertip: Inserts a horizontal legend with 10 circles

button.label: Custom
button.supertip: Opens the dialog to insert a custom legend

button.label: Insert caption for selected shape
button.supertip: Inserts a caption for the selected shape

menu.supertip: Opens the tools for inserting and renumbering captions

button.label: Renumber all captions
button.supertip: Renumbers all captions in the presentation

button.label: Note
button.supertip: Inserts a sticky note on the slide

menu.supertip: Opens the tools for moving, deleting, or converting sticky notes on one or all slides

button.label: Move notes off this slide
button.supertip: Moves all sticky notes off the slide

button.label: Move notes on this slide
button.supertip: Moves all sticky notes onto the slide

button.label: Delete notes on this slide
button.supertip: Deletes all sticky notes on this slide

button.label: Convert comments on this slide to notes
button.supertip: Converts all comments on this slide into sticky notes

button.label: Move notes off all slides
button.supertip: Moves all sticky notes off all slides

button.label: Move notes on all slides
button.supertip: Moves all sticky notes onto all slides

button.label: Delete notes on all slides
button.supertip: Deletes all sticky notes on all slides

button.label: Convert comments on all slides to notes
button.supertip: Converts all comments on all slides into sticky notes

button.label: Steps counter
button.supertip: Inserts a new steps counter

menu.supertip: Opens the tools for creating or selecting steps counters

button.label: Add cross-slide steps counter
button.supertip: Inserts a new cross‑slide steps counter

button.label: Select all step counters on this slide
button.supertip: Selects all steps counters on this slide

button.label: Select all cross-slide step counters on this slide
button.supertip: Selects all cross‑slide steps counters on this slide

menu.label: Stamps
menu.supertip: Provides quick access to slide stamps and tools for moving or removing them on one or all slides

button.label: CONFIDENTIAL
button.supertip: Stamps the slide with CONFIDENTIAL

button.label: DO NOT DISTRIBUTE
button.supertip: Stamps the slide with DO NOT DISTRIBUTE

button.label: DRAFT
button.supertip: Stamps the slide with DRAFT

button.label: UPDATED
button.supertip: Stamps the slide with UPDATED

button.label: NEW
button.supertip: Stamps the slide with NEW

button.label: TO BE REMOVED
button.supertip: Stamps the slide with TO BE REMOVED

button.label: TO APPENDIX
button.supertip: Stamps the slide with TO APPENDIX

button.label: Move Stamps off this slide
button.supertip: Moves all stamp shapes off the slide

button.label: Move Stamps on this slide
button.supertip: Moves all stamp shapes onto the slide

button.label: Delete Stamps on this slide
button.supertip: Deletes all stamp shapes on this slide

button.label: Move Stamps off all slides
button.supertip: Move all stamp shapes just outside the visible slide area on every slide.

button.label: Move Stamps on all slides
button.supertip: Moves all stamp shapes onto the slides

button.label: Delete Stamps on all slides
button.supertip: Deletes all stamp shapes on all slides

button.label: Insert process (SmartArt)
button.supertip: Inserts a process SmartArt graphic

button.label: Insert QR-code
button.supertip: Inserts a QR code that links to a URL

button.label: Instrumenta script editor
button.supertip: Opens the Instrumenta script editor

menu.label: Cleaning tools
menu.supertip: Opens the tools for cleaning and fixing common slide issues

button.label: Move to end and hide selected slides
button.supertip: Moves the selected slides to the end of the presentation and hides them from the slideshow

button.label: Add page numbers to all/selected slides (except the first)
button.supertip: Adds page numbers to the selected slides or the entire presentation, skipping the first slide

button.label: Remove animations from all/selected slides
button.supertip: Removes all animations from the selected slides or from the entire presentation

button.label: Remove entry transitions from all/selected slides
button.supertip: Removes entry transitions from the selected slides or from the entire presentation

button.label: Remove speaker notes from all/selected slides
button.supertip: Removes speaker notes from the selected slides or from the entire presentation

button.label: Remove comments from all/selected slides
button.supertip: Removes comments from the selected slides or from the entire presentation

button.label: Remove all unused master slides
button.supertip: Removes all master slides that are not used by any slide in the presentation

button.label: Remove all hidden slides
button.supertip: Removes all hidden slides from the presentation

button.label: Convert all/selected slides to pictures (readonly)
button.supertip: Converts the selected slides or the entire presentation into readonly picture slides

button.label: Watermark and then convert all/selected slides to pictures (readonly)
button.supertip: Adds a watermark to the selected slides or the entire presentation and then converts them into readonly picture slides

button.label: Anonymize all/selected slides with Lorem Ipsum
button.supertip: Replaces text on the selected slides or the entire presentation with Lorem Ipsum to anonymize content

button.label: Replace colors in selected shapes
button.supertip: Replaces colors in the selected shapes

menu.supertip: Opens the tools for replacing colors in slides or shapes

button.label: Replace colors in all/selected slides
button.supertip: Replaces colors in the selected slides or the entire presentation

button.label: Pyramid storyline builder
button.supertip: Opens the storyline builder to capture SCQ and structure your message

button.label: Manage hidden tags to shapes or slides
button.supertip: Manages the hidden tags applied to shapes or slides

menu.supertip: Opens the tools for viewing and selecting slides by tag

button.label: Show slidetags on all slides
button.supertip: Shows the hidden tags on all slides

button.label: Hide slidetags on all slides
button.supertip: Hides the hidden tags on all slides

button.label: Select slides by tag(s) or specific stamp
button.supertip: Selects slides based on their tags or a specific stamp

menu.supertip: Opens the mail merge tools for inserting and updating merge fields or generating slides from data

button.label: Mail merge this slide based on Excel-file (duplicate slide within this presentation)
button.supertip: Duplicates this slide using data from an Excel file

button.label: Mail merge full presentation based on Excel-file (duplicate presentation file)
button.supertip: Duplicates the presentation using data from an Excel file

button.label: Insert empty merge field
button.supertip: Inserts an empty merge field

button.label: Insert merge fields from Excel-file
button.supertip: Inserts merge fields from an Excel file

button.label: Manually replace all merge fields on all slides
button.supertip: Replaces all merge fields on all slides using manually entered values

button.label: Find Instrumenta features
button.supertip: Opens the search tool to quickly find Instrumenta features and commands

button.label: Instrumenta settings
button.supertip: Opens the Instrumenta settings dialog

button.label: Show about dialog
button.supertip: Opens the About dialog with version and support information
